titles.title: American Innovation Act of 2020
American Innovation Act of 2020
American Innovation Act of 2020
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to promote new business innovation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Select Revenue Measures.

Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
